en.base_start:
Â» Welcome to RadioBot Â«
This bot was made for streaming music/audio in **Telegram Voice Chats**. It's functionality is easy to understand, being explained in the `/help` command.

Â» I hope you enjoy my bot, right now, it's a small personal project. I'm not actively developing it, but I'm trying to. You can follow my progress on it in the following [github repository](https://github.com/x93bd0/radiobot), or in [my personal channel](http://t.me/x93dev).

âœ¨ Thank you for using me! âœ¨
en.base_help:
Â» Command List Â«
Â» **Start the bot:** /start
Â»Â» Sends a welcome message

Â» **Retrieve help message:** /help
Â»Â» Sends this message

Â» **Play something:** /play
Â»Â» Plays whatever you put as an argument (right now, it supports direct links and YouTube links)
Â»Â» __Example:__ `/play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DV7J9kwAtOQ`

Â» **Play next in queue:** /next
Â»Â» Skips the song that's currently being played, and plays the next one

Â» **Pause the transmission**: /pause
Â»Â» Pauses whatever is being played

Â» **Resume the transmission:** /resume
Â»Â» Resumes a previously paused transmission

Â» **Stop the transmission:** /stop
Â»Â» Stops the current session and deletes the playlist

Â» **Change the transmission volume:** /volume
Â»Â» Changes the transmission volume to the one you pass as an argument
Â»Â» __This command is known for not working correctly, use it at your own risk__

Â» **Transmission status:** /status
Â»Â» Updates the current playing status message

Â» **Upcoming songs:** /playlist
Â»Â» Sends a list of upcoming songs in the queue, including the one that's being played
